scripts.start: concurrently "node Server.js" "cd ../Microservices/Add && node Server.js" "cd ../Microservices/Delete && node Server.js" "cd ../Microservices/Find && node Server.js" "cd ../Microservices/View && node Server.js"
scripts.dev: concurrently "nodemon Server.js" "cd ../Microservices/Add && nodemon Server.js" "cd ../Microservices/Delete && nodemon Server.js" "cd ../Microservices/Find && nodemon Server.js" "cd ../Microservices/View && nodemon Server.js"
